pageContext.claim: “Governor Jerry “Moonbeam” Brown pardoned 5 criminal illegal aliens whose crimes include (1) Kidnapping and Robbery (2) Badly beating wife and threatening a crime with intent to terrorize (3) Dealing drugs. Is this really what the great people of California want? @FoxNews”
pageContext.analysis: Gov. Jerry Brown (D-Calif.) pardoned 14 immigrants who primarily were convicted of non-violent charges. All of the people who received clemency had served time for their crimes and were now upstanding citizens in their communities.
